component.name: Gifcurry
component.summary: Your open source video to GIF maker built with Haskell

description.p: Gifcurry is your open source video to GIF maker built with Haskell. Import a video, trim, crop, add text, pick a font, set the size, and save your creation as a GIF or a video. Making GIFs with Gifcurry is fun so try it out!
